question.title: Question
question.description: What is the primary purpose of thyroid scintigraphy in the etiological approach to hyperthyroidism?

option_a.title: To assess thyroid structure and detect nodules
option_a.description: A common use of thyroid scintigraphy

option_b.title: To measure thyroid function and detect hyperthyroidism
option_b.description: A common use of thyroid function tests

option_c.title: To guide thyroid surgery and determine the extent of disease
option_c.description: A common use of thyroid ultrasound

option_d.title: To evaluate the effectiveness of treatment and monitor disease progression
option_d.description: A common use of thyroid scintigraphy and ultrasound
